forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow and a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 14. West northwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow and a slight chance of snow showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 22. West wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Snow Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 12, with temperatures rising to around 14 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -1. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 11am. Cloudy, with a high near 32. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

Nubs Nob.conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled with a track set yesterday. We plan to groom again today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: Today is another day where being on skis is the thing to do. Lake effect bands continued to fall on the ski area through last night, dropping another five inches of snow. Most beginner terrain was re-groomed first thing this morning, with 3-4" of powder on top of most intermediate and advanced terrain. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Bahnhof Race League kicks off tonight on Birch Run. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
